versos: (loud) 2 Samuel 22:14 - "The Lord thundered from heaven; the voice of the Most High resounded.";;;
(wrath) "For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men, who by their unrighteousness suppress the truth." - Romans 1:18;;;
(prison) Hebrews 13:3 - Remember those who are in prison
(doer) James 1:22 - "But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves.";;;
(butler) Genesis 40:1 - "Some time later, the cupbearer and the baker of the king of Egypt offended their master, the king of Egypt.";;;
(baker) Genesis 40:1 - "Some time later, the cupbearer and the baker of the king of Egypt offended their master, the king of Egypt.";;;
(east) Genesis 13:11 - So Lot chose for himself all the Jordan Valley
(ward) Genesis 40:3 - "And he put them in ward in the house of the captain of the guard, into the prison, the place where Joseph was bound.";;;
(season) Ecclesiastes 3:1 - "There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under the heavens.";;;
(sad) Psalm 34:18 - "The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.";;;

(clusters) Isaiah 65:8 - "This is what the Lord says: 'As when juice is still found in a cluster of grapes and people say, 'Don't destroy it, there is still some good in it,' so will I do in behalf of my servants; I will not destroy them all.'";;;
(ripe) 2 Timothy 4:2 - preach the word; be ready in season and out of season; reprove, rebuke, and exhort, with complete patience and teaching.;;;
(cup) Matthew 26:39 - "Going a little farther, he fell with his face to the ground and prayed, 'My Father, if it is possible, may this cup be taken from me. Yet not as I will, but as you will.'";;;
(dungeon) Psalm 107:10 - Some sat in darkness and deepest gloom
(baskets) Mark 6:43 - "And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments and of the fish.";;;
(basket) Luke 11:33 - "No one lights a lamp and puts it in a place where it will be hidden, or under a bowl. Instead they put it on its stand, so that those who come in may see the light.";;;
(hanged) "Then Joshua hung the king of Ai on a tree until evening" - Joshua 8:29 NIV;;;
